Comment: Abilities: A0BQ (Dragon Storm), Researchubertip (Tooltip - Learn - Extended)
Value: The hero's expertise of arcane magic enables him to release several spirit dragon to attack his enemies. |n|n|cffffcc00Level 1|r - Enables the release of 2 spirits dragons at once.|n|cffffcc00Level 2|r - Enables the release of 3 spirit dragons at once.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Enables the release of 4 spirit dragons at once.|n|cffffcc00Level 3|r - Enables the release of 5 spirit dragons at once.
